commentary: John Arm Alert: coming out of the cliff. Also, you gotta admire how the moment Vriska's done with her funny prank, she just logs the fuck off. Karkat does just about the same thing, but one has to assume he thinks Tavros is exaggerating and not reporting on his literal paralysis. Karkat calls Flarp a game for girls, which in human culture sounds like a sexist pejorative. But knowing what we know about Flarp and trolls in general, what he probably means is, "Stop playing games for girls.  They're very dangerous, and one of these days it's going to get you killed."
